class vizasm.analysis.security.SecurityAnalyzer.SecurityAnalyzer(methodcall, filters=None)[source]¶

Bases: object, vizasm.vizasm_networkx.AddMethodCallToGraphInterface.AddMethodCallToGraphInterface

Analyze a MethodCall with `SecurityFilter`s.

Parameters :

_methodcall: MethodCall :

the MethodCall that shall be analyzed _filters: list<SecurityFilter>, optional

list of filters to use

_filter_results: dict<SecurityFilter, list<MethodCall>> :

dict holding the results for each filter

Attributes

AVAILABLE_FILTERS: list<classobj<Filter>>  

Methods

add_filter(security_filter) Add a filter.
add_filters(security_filter_list) Add a list of filters.
add_to_graph(graph[, ...]) Add the SecurityFilter and all its filtered content to the graph
apply_filters([graph, ...]) Apply all SecurityFilter and add all to the graph if not None.
format_filter_results() If filtering enabled, format the results of each SecurityFilter and return it as string
get_filter_results()
get_filters()
get_methodcall()
set_filter_results(value)
set_filters(value)
set_methodcall(value)
add_filter(security_filter)[source]¶

Add a filter.

Parameters :

security_filter: SecurityFilter :

the filter to add
add_filters(security_filter_list)[source]¶

Add a list of filters.

Parameters :

security_filter_list: list<SecurityFilter> :

the filters to add
add_to_graph(graph, methodcall_sender_attr_dict=None, methodcall_calls_attr_list_dict=None, sender_methodcall_edge_attr_dict=None)[source]¶

Add the SecurityFilter and all its filtered content to the graph

apply_filters(graph=None, methodcall_sender_attr_dict=None, methodcall_calls_attr_list_dict=None, sender_methodcall_edge_attr_dict=None)[source]¶

Apply all SecurityFilter and add all to the graph if not None.

Parameters :

graph: Graph :

the graph to which the SecurityFilter and its filtered content shall be added. if None, nothing will be added.
Returns :

methodcall: MethodCall :

The filtered MethodCall after applying all filters. A new one will be constructed!
filter_results¶

_filter_results(dict<SecurityFilter, list<MethodCall>>) – dict holding the results for each filter

filters¶

_filters: list<SecurityFilter>, optional – list of filters to use

format_filter_results()[source]¶

If filtering enabled, format the results of each SecurityFilter and return it as string

Helper module for `SecurityFilter`s

vizasm.analysis.security.SecurityFilters.format_available_filters(arch)[source]¶

Return a description of available filters. Available filters are currently those which are in the static field SECURITY_FILTERS
